casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
William Austin NEAL. No. 529P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 10, 2006. William A. Neal, Pro Se. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Parker, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 6th day of October 2006 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Union County:

"Denied by order of the Court in Conference this the 10th day of October 2006."
